AI-powered translation built for YouTube

Video Reader AI is designed for viewers who want to access global content without language barriers.

Whether you're learning a language or watching foreign creators, our AI gives you clear, context-aware subtitles.

On-screen translation

Everything happens directly inside the YouTube player. No switching apps.

Fast & accurate

Powered by advanced AI models optimized for real-time performance.
